title: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 07: Bakuhatsu! Onsen Wakuwaku Daikessen
synopsis: The Nohara family and "Onsen G-Men", the secret government agency maintaining all the hot springs in Japan, fight against "Yuzame", a bath-hating terrorist organization plotting to wipe out all the hot springs in Japan.
